text: [Music]
I'm a liberal in in the in the proper
sense of it I believe in uh you know we
are our brothers keepers not not in in
the sense of Communism but that an a
wealthy civilized country has an
obligation to take care of its less
fortunate and to provide a safety net
for everybody uh I believe in democracy
in the broad sense that that we should
be a shared political Vision there was a
time when I was very young when I
flirted with conservatism I think it's a
phase that people go through it seemed
you could see there were there were
excesses and you looked and but it
didn't last very long and uh the only
thing I would say is I think I I have
become I don't know that my politics
have changed much but my uh but I have
become more political because when I was
when I was in my 20s maybe even when I
was in my
30s I could imagine that policy was
really a matter of intelligent
discussions between people and the best
ideas would automatically Prevail and uh
well that's not the way it is it's uh uh
there are discussions among intelligent
people uh but uh you have to you have to
do more than just you know being being
right is nowhere near enough
